channel.title: I need help with the files
channel.description:
how can i download files on button click ??
i cant find anything for it and i dont rly understand the docs from key auth xD pls help

item.title: I need help with the files
item.dc:creator: mak
item.description:
byte[] result = KeyAuthApp.download("385624");
            if (!KeyAuthApp.response.success)
            {
                MessageBox.Show(KeyAuthApp.response.message);
                Environment.Exit(0);
            }
            else
                File.WriteAllBytes(Directory.GetCurrentDirectory() + "\\test.txt", result);

Replace 385624 with the file ID on KeyAuth dashboard, and the first parameter of the File.WriteAllBytes is the file path you’re downloading file to

The button click part isn’t something to do with KeyAuth, so you’ll need to Google if you cannot figure out, or analyze the KeyAuth example and how it does button click events

Read full topic
